Clever Tape Measure Tricks Every Craftsman Should Know 
From helping with math to drawing straight lines, the humble tape measure has plenty of hidden talents. Most Popular By Eric Limer Feb 27, 2017 A tape measure's purpose is obvious. Just pull out the blade and it will tell you just how long something is. It'll even adjust for the width of its own hook . But in the hands of an experience worker, a tape measure can do much more, including but not limited to: Helping with basic math Pointing at far away objects Drawing straight lines and even circles Making marks without a pencil Listen carefully as the ever wonderful Essential Craftsman explains these tricks and more in detail:   Some of these tricks—like the ones that include various blade markings—are going to be specific to certain high-quality measures. In this case, it's a Stanley PowerLock model . But now that you know exactly how much a tape measure is good for, it's not hard to justify the expense. Just remember, try to keep it dry.
